abstract: Rolling Stone magazine will publish external review of widely disputed article about gang rape at University of Virginia during fraternity house party.
lead_paragraph: The magazine’s managing editor said the review of an article they published in November would be made public “in the next couple of weeks.”

headline.main: Rolling Stone to Publish Review of Disputed Rape Article
headline.print_headline: Rolling Stone to Publish Review of Rape Article

snippet: The magazine’s managing editor said the review of an article they published in November would be made public “in the next couple of weeks.”
